topic.title: Import SUTRA Model Results Dialog Box

para.text: Import SUTRA Model Results Dialog Box

dialog box is used to import, pressure, concentration or temperature, velocities and information related to boundary conditions from a SUTRA model into ModelMuse and optionally color or contour the mesh using one of the imported data sets. The dialog box is displayed by selecting

image.title: Import and display model results button

para.text: The user will first be prompted to select a .nod, .ele, .bcof, .bcos, .bcop, or .bcou file containing the model results or information about the boundary conditions. If a .nod, or .ele file is selected, the data sets contained in both the .nod and .ele files are displayed in the
dialog box. For the other file types, the data sets contained in the individual files are displayed in the

dialog box. The user selects a data set by checking the checkbox next to it. The user must also check the check boxes for the time steps to be imported. If desired, one of the data sets can be used to
after it is imported by selecting the desired
combo box. The imported data sets will be classified under "Optional|Model Results" or "Optional|SUTRA Boundary Results."
